title.rendered: Extrusion Blow Molded Containers With View Strip

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column]

Extrusion Blow Molded Containers With View Strip

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]WASHUN provide the extrusion blow molding machine which combined with an additional screw unit for the view strip. the special designed extrusion head mixes two different color materials into one parison, after the blowing, the containers has a view strip vertically, which helps end of user to get the liquid level easily. This kind of products have been used for the lubrication oil.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our key technology combines those two color materials with less welding line of melted plastic; it gives the container more stretch of it.[/vc_column_text]
Applications
Lubrication oil container, industrial container for the chemical
Advantages
Get to know the liquid level by viewing the vertical view line…
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4369″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Remark

[vc_column_text]Containers with view strip normally is made from co-extrusion blow molding system.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional extrusion blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related extrusion blow molding machines:

[vc_column_text]– MG-S extrusion blow molding machine
– MG-D extrusion blow molding machine
– MG-SL extrusion blow molding machine[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
